content: hey crafters DM Scotty here great to have you with me I want to show you
something cool that I kind of came up with for my own craft table I thought
you might be interested in this is a spice rack okay and one's a little
closer in so you can see what I did here all right here we go here's what i want
to show you this is a spice rack i got okay and it's great for holding your
crafts approp supplies it's on a lazy susan so it turns around so you can
easily access any of this stuff now you could dump out the spices this did come
with spices you could dump them out and fill it with something else like these
crystals but I've also used these medicine bottles that make great craft
holders also and they're clear so you can see through them so you can see
what's in it now I turned the lid upside down so they were more stable on this
thing and you want to make sure when you get these that it's this type that these
medicine bottles will fit into this thing so yeah you could dump out the
spices and use the spices their use of spice bottles or you could just use
these medicine bottles if you know someone that takes medicine just have
them save them for you and it's a great way to recycle the stuff here I got
toothpicks I got beads crystals I got washers and all kinds of stuff I got
gravel all that kind of cut fun stuff so it's all of my fingertips on a lazy
susan just got to grab it and I have it handy so there you go that's a neat
little trick you can do with a spice holder and some medicine bottles or even
old spice bottles so there you go and keep on crafting
